actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
    "itemId" AS value,
    CASE
        WHEN "itemId" = 1 THEN 'I型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 2 THEN 'J型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 3 THEN 'K型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 4 THEN 'A型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 5 THEN 'B型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 6 THEN 'C型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 7 THEN 'D型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 8 THEN 'E型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 9 THEN 'F型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 10 THEN 'G型包围'
        WHEN "itemId" = 11 THEN 'H型包围'
        ELSE '未知套件，请向管理员报告此错误'
    END AS label
FROM public."CarItem"
WHERE "carId" = {{SelectCarId.selectedOptionValue}} AND "category" = 300

UNION

SELECT
    0 AS value,
    '原厂车身套件' AS label
ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT pg_sleep(3);
